doc.name: WiredToWireless
doc.description: On each firing, this actor reads at most one token from the payload and properties input ports, and outputs the payload on the wireless output port with the specified transmit properties. If there are no properties, then the output is sent without properties.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Input port that receives the payload to be transmitted on the output port.
input port that receives the properties to be used for transmission on the output port. The type of this port is a record type.
doc.property: Name of the output channel. This is a string that defaults to "AtomicWirelessChannel".
